name: vulnalert
description: Group Members: Eric Kim, Aaron Liu, Jinwoo Kim

scripts.dev: cd frontend; npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend; npm install && export DEBUG=vulnalert:*,express:*; npm start
scripts.prod: cd frontend; npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend; npm install && npm start
scripts.frontend: cd frontend; npm install && npm start
scripts.backend: cd backend; npm install && npm start
scripts.backend-prod: cd backend; npm install && npm start
scripts.backend-dev: cd backend; npm install && export DEBUG=vulnalert:*,express:*; npm start
